params.defense: Invincible (Except a fully powered up juggernaut, War, and similar roles.)

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
Is allowed to protect a single target each night from any amount of attacking visitors
- You do not protect against:
 - Astral visits
 - Jailors
 - Rampages
- Ignitions
 - Hauntings
 - Juggernaut (Both your target and the juggernaut will die, and therefore so do you, and you shall lose)
You will lose if your targets die, but not if you protect them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Everybody knows who you are
RB/Rolestop immune, Control immune, Transport immune, Investigation immune
